p: Histopathological analysis showed that the HMWp treatment (at a dose of 5Âµg/g BW, alternate day over a period of 21 days) did not cause any gross pathological lesions in the vital organs (heart, lung, liver, spleen and kidneys). The histological sections of heart, lung, liver, spleen and kidney of the control and treated mice are shown in Fig. 5B.
